positive_examples: This is an example of chitin.
We observed chitin in this context.
A typical case of chitin would involve these features.
The concept of chitin applies here.
A structural polysaccharide that forms the exoskeleton of arthropods and cell walls of fungi.
negative_examples: This is an example of starch, not chitin.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Starch, or other types of Carbohydrate

definition: A structural polysaccharide forming the exoskeletons of arthropods and fungal cell walls.
